pr_title: expressing an alternative to action contracts

timeline.message: expressing an alternative to action contracts

timeline.bodyText: You'll need to annotate this method with JsonIgnore so that the JSON object created doesn't add a models attribute to the resulting object.
timeline.author: psantos1113

replies.bodyText: Could I alternatively (or in addition) make the method protected?
replies.author: ekerwin

replies.bodyText: I honestly not sure what Jackson would do.  From what I understand it uses the getters and setters which are usually public but I don't know if protected getter would be serialized or hidden.  I assume it would be hidden.
replies.author: psantos1113

replies.bodyText: Regardless of Jackson, I think getModels() should be protected to better express intent.
replies.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: Do you not have SaveActions enabled? Two lines of whitespace here.
timeline.author: gkillough
